name: Attack of the Beat Team
description:
Prototype rhythm game where the user creates the rhythm. Make a rhythm and it will deal damage to the enemy. The game evaluates you rhythm you make and how accurate you are at playing the rhythm you made and does damage based on that. 

Controls

  • Space    -    1st time to create your Rhythm, 2nd to play the Rhythm you created.
  • ZXCVBNM    -    Your Beats. 
  • 1    -    Saves your current Rhythm so you can use it for other stages.
  • 0    -    Loads your saved Rhythm.
